class InterruptManager __attribute__
SyscallHandler g_syscall_handlers [NumLinuxSyscalls]

Detailed Description

This module contains all the classes and algorithms needed to boot Horizon without a host OS.

It emulates a Linux operating system - enough of Linux to boot LLVM and glibc, anyway. This code can bootstrap straight from a bootloader into a "hosted" environment for glibc, libstdc++, libboost, LLVM and of course Horizon to run.
